product_name: REI Big Brr Down Jacket - Boys'
long_description: The REI Big Brr down jacket offers grown-up, down-filled warmth, comfort and performance for your active boy as he ventures out into the crisp, cold conditions of a winter wonderland. 650-fill duck down ensures warmth, light weight and compressibility; lightweight, recycled ripstop shell and lining feature quilt stitching to help keep down from shifting. Durable Water Repellent-treated down and shell fabric fend off moisture to help maintain loft and warmth. Full-length stormflap covers the zipper to block wind and snow; chin guard helps protect sensitive skin from abrasion. Hand pockets warm fingers with cozy brushed tricot lining. Mock neck; two chest pockets.
